articles.title: Rory McIlroy played a round of golf with Donald Trump three years ago. This is why he ‘wouldn’t’ do it again - Fox Sports
articles.description: Three years ago, Rory McIlroy played a round of golf with Donald Trump and, almost as soon as he walked off the 18th hole, he was slaughtered by many of his fans on social media.
articles.content:
On Thursday, appearing on the McKellar Podcast, McIlroy was asked about that round with the president and vowed it would be the last time hed ever play with Trump.
Asked about that round and the subsequent reaction it elicited, McIlroy said, Guilt by associa… [+2612 chars]
